name: bootstrap-less-port
description: A Less port of Bootstrap v4
author: Sean Ju√°rez <seanjcodes+bs-less-port@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run css
scripts.css: npm run css-compile && npm run css-prefix && npm run css-minify
scripts.css-compile: lessc --math=parens --source-map less/bootstrap.less dist/css/bootstrap.css && lessc --math=parens --source-map less/bootstrap-grid.less dist/css/bootstrap-grid.css && lessc --math=parens --source-map less/bootstrap-reboot.less dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --format keep-breaks --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/css/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --format keep-breaks --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-grid.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-grid.css && cleancss --level 1 --format keep-breaks --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
